attributes.action: To give the prolific author Robert Rankin  an MBE in honour of his many works which have made millions if not zillions laugh
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Robert Rankin is the author of over thirty science fiction/comedy novels and has been given the title of The Father of Far Fetched Fiction.  Robert is a vastly underrated writer and has been for far too long been under the shadow of Terry Pratchett and J K Rowling and he deserves his place in the sun and in hearts of the nation.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
